comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: He is wearing a U.S. Army uniform and this DH-4 "Liberty" is wearing the fuselage insignia of the 9th Aero Squadron, that flew Breguet 14 B2 bombers in France in WWI. Whether it is painted in black like the earlier Breguet 14s were is not known, but this DH-4 could be!
